TopicTitle: I think I'm going to get rid of realism overhaul on my R.S.S. Game.

Articles.Content:
I just find the rescales a bit to strange, I'll be sure to find a way to build better launch systems.

Don't take it personal nathankell, and thank you Nathan for helping me get R.S.S./10X Kerbol to work.

Do any of you guys use realism overhaul with the 10X Kerbol/R.S.S. mod?

Edited April 11, 2014 by WindShieIds
That is indeed the only thing keeping me from RSS. The low-res blurry, featureless planets.
They're working on it, if you had't heard already there's also a new version turning kerbin into the real earth which looks really nice if I may say so myself.
